text: Intense Tropical Cyclone Batsirai was a powerful tropical cyclone that hit Madagascar. Batsirai formed on 24 January 2022. It became a moderate tropical storm on 27 January, after which it became an intense tropical cyclone. 20 deaths have been reported in the country. ==References== Category:2022 disasters in Africa Category:February 2022 events Category:2020s in Madagascar Batsirai Category:Mauritius Category:RÃ©union
title: Cyclone Batsirai
